text: "Lucky" is a song by Jason Mraz and Colbie Caillat. It is the third single from Mraz's third studio album We Sing. We Dance. We Steal Things. Mraz and Caillat won the 2010 Grammy Award for Best Pop Collaboration with Vocals. Mraz and Lil Wayne also did a remix of the song "Lucky" and later was released on Z100. "Lucky" first appeared on the Billboard Hot 100 at number 96. On the same week it had a debut on the Pop 100 chart at 84 and moved to a peak of 48. The next week the song rose to number 84 on the Hot 100 and peaked at number 48. ==References== Category:Grammy Award-winning songs Category:Pop songs Category:2009 songs Category:Jason Mraz songs Category:Colbie Caillat songs
title: Lucky (Jason Mraz and Colbie Caillat song)
